amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for the Domestic Nuclear Detection Office by $36 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding (by offset) for the Domestic Nuclear Detection Office by $36,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Langevin amendment Failed by recorded vote: 205 - 216 (Roll no. 214).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Langevin.
